mapper.select: SELECT user.id , user.deleted , user.created_at as createdAt , user.modified_at as modifiedAt , user.username , user.password , user.name , user.phone FROM user WHERE user.id = #{id}
SELECT user.id FROM user WHERE user.id is not NULL AND user.deleted = #{deleted} AND user.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')

SELECT user.id FROM user WHERE user.id is not NULL AND user.deleted = #{deleted} AND user.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%') ORDER BY user.created_at ORDER BY user.username DESC ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{perpage}
SELECT count(user.id) as listsize FROM user WHERE user.id is not NULL AND user.deleted = #{deleted} AND user.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')
